description: Spider API for web crawling and scraping.

spider_api_key.info: The Spider API Key, get it from https://spider.cloud

url.info: The URL to scrape or crawl

mode.info: The mode of operation: scrape or crawl

limit.info: The maximum amount of pages allowed to crawl per website. Set to 0 to crawl all pages.

depth.info: The crawl limit for maximum depth. If 0, no limit will be applied.

blacklist.info: Blacklist paths that you do not want to crawl. Use Regex patterns.

whitelist.info: Whitelist paths that you want to crawl, ignoring all other routes. Use Regex patterns.

readability.info: Use readability to pre-process the content for reading.

request_timeout.info: Timeout for the request in seconds.

params.info: Additional parameters to pass to the API. If provided, other inputs will be ignored.
